meta.title: Vert.x 3.2.1 is released!
meta.summary: We are pleased to announce the release of Vert.x 3.2.1!

meta.title: Vert.x 3 and Azure cloud platform tutorial
meta.summary: Vert.x 3.2.1 applications can quickly be deployed on Microsoft Azure. Deployment is independent of your build so it is all about configuration.

meta.title: Intro to Vert.x Shell
meta.summary: Vert.x Shell provides an extensible command line for Vert.x, accessible via SSH, Telnet or a nice Web interface. Vert.x Shell comes out of the box with plenty of commands.

meta.title: Vert.x 3.3.2 is released!
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.3.2, the first bug fix release of Vert.x 3.3.x.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1
meta.summary: This new version is a bug fix release that addresses issues reported in Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1. We also updated Netty to version 4.1.39.Final to fix some CVEs.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.5
meta.summary: This version is a minor bug fix release addressing issues found in Vert.x 3.8.4. We would like to thank you all for reporting these issues.
